author: Victor Bergeron
description: To quote Trader Vic, "Lethal but smooth - pineapple at its best".
name: Pino Pepe
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop crushed ice
POUR into glass (or pineapple shell) and serve with straws
If using a pineapple shell, serve with ice cubes
